snippet: After a tough-to-swallow 19-17 loss to the Eagles, Giants players tried to break down how they could have done things differently.
abstract: New York Giants, having lost eight of their last nine games, are failing to come from behind and win as they did in many games last season.
lead_paragraph: After a tough-to-swallow 19-17 loss to the Eagles, Giants players tried to break down how they could have done things differently.

headline.seo: Giants Learn That Late Rallies Are Not a Sure Thing
headline.main: Giants Learn That Late Rallies Are Not a Sure Thing
headline.print_headline: Giants Learn That a Rally Only Seems a Given
